TopicTitle: Landing On Eve, Plant A Flag And Return To Orbit in KSP 1.0.4

Articles.Content:
Hiho Kerbonauts,

i just wanted to share how i did land a Kerbal on Eve, plant a flag and return to orbit in KSP 1.0.4.

Except of mechjeb i only used stock parts. Hope you like it.

cheers, Toddi

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zZmIHtiHRa4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I'm soooo jealous. This is the last major feat in the game that I haven't been able to achieve.

> 
> I'm soooo jealous. This is the last major feat in the game that I haven't been able to achieve.

Same! I've had like 10 Eve attempts and only one got close to it's goal!
and welcome to the forums mr Toddi

WOW that's what you need to do to get off the surface of Eve in 1.0? That's insane! Nicely done.

JR

> 
> and welcome to the forums mr Toddi

thanks a lot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I have to admit, i was a little obsessed with this "quest" and just needed to share now. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
